trans-unit.source: Enable Customer Payments Through Payment Services| Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Enable Customer Payments Through Payment Services| Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Povolení platby odběratelů prostřednictvím platebních služeb | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Make it easier for customers to pay their invoices by enabling payment services.

seg-source.mrk: Make it easier for customers to pay their invoices by enabling payment services.

target.mrk: Usnadníte zákazníkům zaplacení faktur povolením platebních služeb.

trans-unit.source: Enable Customer Payments Through Payment Services

seg-source.mrk: Enable Customer Payments Through Payment Services

target.mrk: Povolení platby odběratelů prostřednictvím platebních služeb

trans-unit.source: As an alternative to collecting payments through bank transfer or credit cards, your customers can pay you through their account with payment services, such as Microsoft Pay, PayPal, or WorldPay.

seg-source.mrk: As an alternative to collecting payments through bank transfer or credit cards, your customers can pay you through their account with payment services, such as Microsoft Pay, PayPal, or WorldPay.

target.mrk: Jako alternativu k vybírání plateb prostřednictvím bankovních převodů nebo kreditních karet Vám Vaši zákazníci mohou zaplatit prostřednictvím svého účtu u platebních služeb, jako je například Microsoft Pay, PayPal nebo WorldPay.

trans-unit.source: After you enable a payment service in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], a link to the service is available on sales documents that you send by email to your customers.

seg-source.mrk: After you enable a payment service in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], a link to the service is available on sales documents that you send by email to your customers.

target.mrk: Po povolení platebních služeb v [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], je k dispozici odkaz na tuto službu v prodejních dokladech, které odesíláte e-mailem vašim zákazníkům.

trans-unit.source: Customers can use the link to go to the payment service and pay the bill, directly from the sales document.

seg-source.mrk: Customers can use the link to go to the payment service and pay the bill, directly from the sales document.

target.mrk: Zákazníci mohou pomocí tohoto odkazu přejít na platební službu a zaplatit účet přímo z prodejního dokladu.

trans-unit.source: If you don't want to include the link, for example, if a customer will pay with cash, you can remove the payment service from the invoice before posting.

seg-source.mrk: If you don't want to include the link, for example, if a customer will pay with cash, you can remove the payment service from the invoice before posting.

target.mrk: Pokud nechcete zahrnout odkaz, například pokud zákazník zaplatí hotovostí, můžete před zaúčtováním odebrat platební službu z faktury.

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Pay, PayPal Payments Standard, and WorldPay Payments Standard extensions are installed in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], and are ready for you to enable.

seg-source.mrk: The Microsoft Pay, PayPal Payments Standard, and WorldPay Payments Standard extensions are installed in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)], and are ready for you to enable.

target.mrk: V [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] jsou instalovány standardní rozšíření Microsoft Pay, PayPal Payments Standart a WorldPay Payments a připraveny k povolení.

trans-unit.source: To enable a payment service in [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)]

seg-source.mrk: To enable a payment service in

target.mrk: K povolení platební služby v

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Payment Services**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Payment Services**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat stránku, nebo sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona vyhledat stránku, nebo sestavu"), zadejte **Služby pro platby** a pak vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: In the **Payment Services** window, choose the **New** action.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Payment Services** window, choose the **New** action.

target.mrk: V okně **Služby pro platby**, vyberte akci **Nové**.

trans-unit.source: Select the payment service, and then close the window.

seg-source.mrk: Select the payment service, and then close the window.

target.mrk: Vyberte platební službu a poté zavřete okno.

trans-unit.source: In the **Payment Services** window, choose the **Setup** action.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Payment Services** window, choose the **Setup** action.

target.mrk: V okně **Služby pro platby**, vyberte akci **Instalace**.

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: Fill in the fields as necessary.

target.mrk: Vyplňte pole podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: Close the window.

seg-source.mrk: Close the window.

target.mrk: Zavřete okno.

trans-unit.source: To select a payment service on a sales invoice

seg-source.mrk: To select a payment service on a sales invoice

target.mrk: Pro výběr platební služby na prodejní faktuře

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Sales Invoices**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Search for Page or Report](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Search for Page or Report icon") icon, enter **Sales Invoices**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Zvolte ikonu ![Vyhledat stránku, nebo sestavu](media/ui-search/search_small.png "ikona vyhledat stránku, nebo sestavu"), zadejte **Prodejní faktury** a pak vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Open the sales invoice that you want to pay by using the payment service.

seg-source.mrk: Open the sales invoice that you want to pay by using the payment service.

target.mrk: Otevřete prodejní fakturu, kterou chcete uhradit pomocí platební služby.

trans-unit.source: In the **Payment Service** field, choose the payment service.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Payment Service** field, choose the payment service.

target.mrk: Na poli **Služby pro platby**, vyberte platební službu.

trans-unit.source: The **Payment Service** field is available only if you've enabled the payment service.

seg-source.mrk: The **Payment Service** field is available only if you've enabled the payment service.

target.mrk: Pole **Služby pro platby** je k dispozici pouze v případě, že jste povolili platební službu.
